name: Amazing Blondel
description: '''Amazing Blondel''' was an [[England|English]] acoustic [[progressive folk]] band, consisting of Eddie Baird, John Gladwin and Terry Wincott. They released LPs on [[Island Records]] in the early 1970s. They were sometimes categorised as [[psychedelic folk]] or as [[medieval folk rock]], but their music was more a reinvention of [[Renaissance music]], based around the use of period instruments such as [[lute]]s and [[Recorder (musical instrument)|recorder]]s.
